name: Stoke Beach House
description:
Looking for more than the average hotel experience? You’re in the right place! Located 200 meters from Manly Beach, the newly renovated Stoke Beach House is more than just a place to rest your weary head after a night of partying. It’s about escaping the mundane every day and reigniting your sense of belonging, adventure and curiosity.

Stoke Beach House is about the full experience, and you can enjoy the following perks during your stay; 
- Complimentary daily breakfast
- Complimentary yoga classes (Monday, Wednesday, Friday & Saturday)
- Free equipment hire for 2 hrs - cruiser bikes, surfboards, snorkels, skateboards & beach games
- In-house bar
- Pool table in the courtyard
- Commercial communal kitchen
- Weekly special events & outings
- In-house laundry
- Computer access
- Cinema room
- Free WiFi
- Discounts at local venues
- Surf & dive packages
- An epic Stoke crew to assist with anything you need!

Salute the sun with a 1-hour morning yoga class before making your way to complimentary daily breakfast with your housemates. Pick up a Stoke surfboard, bike or set of snorkels from reception for a day of adventuring, followed by a sundowner at the in-house bar before the night’s shenanigans get started.

It’s the perfect home base from which to learn to surf Manly Beaches world-renowned waves, dive into a PADI course or explore some of Sydney’s most insanely beautiful destinations. A 5-star experience for budding surfers, divers, chillers, partiers, the world’s hottest travellers… and us!

Famous for its world-renowned waves, laid-back vibe and friendly locals, making great mates is inevitable at The Beach House.

~ About the Area ~ 
Stoke Beach House is located 100 meters from Manly Beach and only 5-minutes’ walk from the bustling Manly Wharf. Sydney CBD is a 30-minute ferry ride from Manly Wharf, making getting a Harbour Bridge or Opera House pic for the gram a fantastic day out.

Check-In / Check-Out Policies
•	Check-In: 2:00 pm
•	Check-Out: 10:00 am
•	Late Check-Out: 2:00 pm
•	Late Check-Out Fees: 100%

~ Special Check-In Instructions ~ 
For check-ins after reception working hours, please contact our Night Manager, by the time you arrive at our property, on (02) 9977 3411
We always do our best to accommodate our guests before check-in time. However, if the room is not ready, we have a luggage room in which you can store your belongings for free.

~  Special Late Check-Out Instructions ~ 
Late check-out is subject to availability and may result in an additional fee of 100%. To make arrangements for late check-out, please contact Stoke Beach House ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation or visit reception during open hours.

~ Cancellations ~ 
•	48 hours (two days) Cancellation Policy applies to all bookings.
•	The first night will be charged for any cancellations made within this period
•	You are welcome to cancel any reservation provided it is 48 hours (two days) before your check-in date.

~ Smoking ~ 
Stoke Beach House is a smoke free property. Smoking is not allowed at any time inside the property.

~  Pets ~ 
While we love animals and kelpie cuddles, in particular, pet slumber parties are not allowed. 

~ Children & Extra Beds ~ 
•	All guests must be over the age of 18 years, a hold a valid photo ID document will be requested upon check-in (such as a valid driver’s license, proof of age card or passport).
•	Cots (infant beds), rollaway and extra beds are not available.

~ Key Cards ~ 
Stoke Beach House is a safe and secure building; all rooms and access to the property are made through security key cards. All guests are required to place a security deposit of AUD $70 per room. Upon returning the key and bedding at the end of your stay, the security deposit will be refunded in full. For any lost key cards there will be a charge of $5.

~ TERMS AND CONDITIONS ~ 
General Information
•	Check-In: You must be over the age of 18 years and hold a valid photo ID document will be requested upon check-in (such as a valid driver's licence, proof of age card or passport)
•	Check-Out: Is between 9 am - 10 am. Penalties apply if you stay past this time
•	Extensions: Looking to extending your stay? Let reception know at the LATEST the night before the check-out date. We will do our best to extend your stay subject to the required availability
•	Group Bookings: More than 6 people must call reception between 9 am - 7 pm daily to check room availability and policies.

•	Smoking: Stoke beach House is a smoke-free property.
•	Suggestion: We suggest anyone 40+ years old book, one of our twin or king rooms.

A refundable comprehensive deposit MUST be paid at check-in and when checking out the following conditions must apply:
1.	Room key card must be returned. Lost or broken key cards will be charged AUD $5.
2.	Guests must pay a security deposit of AUD $70 which is refunded at check-out. 
3.	No sleeping bags are to be used in the rooms.
4.	Please be considerate to other guests and contain your belongings in the storage provided only.
5.	Late room charges/rent payments will be charged to your credit card unless alternative arrangements have pre-organised with reception.
6.	Early cancellation of in-house guest reservations must be made 48 hours (two days) prior to your new departure date or two night’s room penalty rate will be charged.
7.	If you are locked out of your room after reception hours, there is a Night Manager fee of AUD $10 for recurrent situations.
8.	If you lose your key, it will only cost you AUD $5 for a new one.
9.	If you don’t hand in your linen at the end of your stay, it will cost you your full $70 security deposit.
10.	If you are responsible for setting off the fire alarm, you will be charged $2,200 fee.
11.	If you damage any part of the Stoke Beach House property or items provided to you by Stoke Beach House, you will be charged the full costs incurred to fix the damage caused.
12.	Any member of Stoke Beach House may ask you to leave the property at any time for any reason however in particular for any of these reasons: illegal drugs; fighting; property damage; smoking inside of the room; breaking into the kitchen, courtyard or other people's rooms. You will not receive any refund from your booking payment or key deposit.

~ Payment Policy ~ 
We accept all MasterCard and Visa Credit Cards.

~ Privacy Policy ~ 
The Stoke Beach House privacy policy be found on our website
